metadata.description:
A time-twisting romantic thriller-noir metaphysical black comedy from the
smash-hit writer of *X-Men Legacy* and *Crossed: Wish You Were Here*!

Numbercruncher is the story of a lovesick, dying Mathematician who cheats
the rules of the Afterlife to be reincarnated again and again within his
lover's lifetime... and faces the full force of Karmic Accountancy -- in the
form of Karmic agent Bastard Zane -- as a result!
metadata.name: Numbercruncher
